name: PeekingIterator_peekingIteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the PeekingIterator class, focusing on its behavior with different types of iterators.

test_cases.name: testPeekingIteratorWithNonNullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the creation and behavior of PeekingIterator with a non-null iterator.

test_cases.name: testPeekingIteratorWithNullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of PeekingIterator when provided with a null iterator, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testPeekingIteratorWithPeekingIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of PeekingIterator when provided with another PeekingIterator, expecting the same instance to be returned.
